fontFamily.title: Font family
fontFamily.description: The font family used to render text.

fontSize.title: Font size
fontSize.description: The font size used to render text.

lineHeight.title: Line height
lineHeight.description: The line height used to render text.

screenReaderMode.title: Screen Reader Mode
screenReaderMode.description: Add accessibility elements for use with screen readers.

scrollback.title: Scrollback Buffer
scrollback.description: The amount of scrollback beyond initial viewport

shutdownOnClose.title: Shut down on close
shutdownOnClose.description: Shut down the session when closing the terminal.

pasteWithCtrlV.title: Paste with Ctrl+V
pasteWithCtrlV.description: Enable pasting with Ctrl+V.  This can be disabled to use Ctrl+V in the vi editor, for instance.  This setting has no effect on macOS, where Cmd+V is available
